name: Pinball Trooper
description:
It all started with an alien virus that when it makes contact with an inanimate object, they come to life. Bollycono, a space soldier, is the culprit of spreading the virus and therefore he must take responsibility and fight against them.

The objects affected by the virus are Kaboom, Mocon and Gravity.

Objective of the game

Kill the boss and go to the next level.
